methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring: Parse the AFM file in file object *fh*.

methods.name: string_width_height
methods.docstring:
Return the string width (including kerning) and string height
as a (*w*, *h*) tuple.

methods.name: get_str_bbox_and_descent
methods.docstring: Return the string bounding box and the maximal descent.

methods.name: get_str_bbox
methods.docstring: Return the string bounding box.

methods.name: get_name_char
methods.docstring: Get the name of the character, i.e., ';' is 'semicolon'.

methods.name: get_width_char
methods.docstring: Get the width of the character from the character metric WX field.

methods.name: get_width_from_char_name
methods.docstring: Get the width of the character from a type1 character name.

methods.name: get_height_char
methods.docstring: Get the bounding box (ink) height of character *c* (space is 0).

methods.name: get_kern_dist
methods.docstring: Return the kerning pair distance (possibly 0) for chars *c1* and *c2*.

methods.name: get_kern_dist_from_name
methods.docstring:
Return the kerning pair distance (possibly 0) for chars
*name1* and *name2*.

methods.name: get_fontname
methods.docstring: Return the font name, e.g., 'Times-Roman'.

methods.name: get_fullname
methods.docstring: Return the font full name, e.g., 'Times-Roman'.

methods.name: get_familyname
methods.docstring: Return the font family name, e.g., 'Times'.

methods.name: family_name
methods.docstring: The font family name, e.g., 'Times'.

methods.name: get_weight
methods.docstring: Return the font weight, e.g., 'Bold' or 'Roman'.

methods.name: get_angle
methods.docstring: Return the fontangle as float.

methods.name: get_capheight
methods.docstring: Return the cap height as float.

methods.name: get_xheight
methods.docstring: Return the xheight as float.

methods.name: get_underline_thickness
methods.docstring: Return the underline thickness as float.

methods.name: get_horizontal_stem_width
methods.docstring:
Return the standard horizontal stem width as float, or *None* if
not specified in AFM file.

methods.name: get_vertical_stem_width
methods.docstring:
Return the standard vertical stem width as float, or *None* if
not specified in AFM file.
